entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Val-d'Or
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:51 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Val-d'Or Regional Airport 09:51 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: E 22 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning then becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
